title: 'Bold liner'
body: The media could not be loaded. I was quite surprised such bold colour in just one stroke especially at this price range. Yes it was smudge proof but I'm not sure if your face is oily then probably it'll smudge. Not water proof. It doesn't wear off when water is poured bt when smudged with water it easily wears off.

title: Must try,you won't regret after buying this.
body: I absolutely love this Blue heaven eyeliner.i used their products before and even my mom love this brand so much, that's why it's a trusted brand for me. The applicator have thin bristles which is good as you can apply accordingly and will be very helpful to give you a very nice and easy winged liner look. This is pocket friendly as well. And this time I luckily got extra pack as a gift from the seller.so happy........ thankyou ğŸ’.
